install.name: Content - SocialList
install.author: Vadim Tropnikov
install.description: Widget for Bookmarking and Social Media services. Support many languages and hundreds services.

param.name: button_dx
param.label: Button Width
param.description: Width of widget button in pixels (numbers only).

param.name: button_dy
param.label: Button Height
param.description: Height of widget button in pixels (numbers only).

param.name: cols
param.label: Hint Window Columns
param.description: Number of columns in widget hint window (numbers only).

param.name: rows
param.label: Hint Window Rows
param.description: Number of rows in widget hint window (numbers only).

param.name: staticcontent
param.label: Type of Content to Display With
param.description: Do you want the widget to appear on regular content, static content, or all content?

param.name: homedisplay
param.label: Homepage
param.description: No to display nothing on the homepage, Top to display the widget in the top (left or right), Bottom to display the wigget at the bottom (left, center or right).

param.name: contentdisplay
param.label: Content
param.description: No to display nothing on the content page, Top to display the widget in the top (left or right), Bottom to display the wigget at the bottom (left, center or right).

param.name: excludecategories
param.label: Categories to Exclude
param.description: Comma-separated list of categories to exclude.

param.name: manualurl
param.label: Manual URLs
param.description: Select Yes if you manually declare any alternate URLs in your content, default is no for the sake of performance.

param.name: currenturl
param.label: Use current URL (safe mode)
param.description: Select Yes if your website uses a complicated URL format that the SocialList cannot recreate (set this to Yes if the generated URLs are incorrect). THIS WILL DISABLE WIDGET FROM DISPLAYING ON THE HOMEPAGE OR ANY PREVIEW PAGE.

param.name: removebaseurl
param.label: Remove duplicate base URL
param.description: Only set this to YES if the plugin is adding an extra base URL to your hyperlinks.

param.name: bookmarktext
param.label: Bookmarker Text
param.description: The text to display above the bottom wigget button.
